.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.Models.ResourceTestStatus BeginTest(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.IFunctionsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string jobName, string functionName, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.Models.Function function) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function BeginTest (operations As IFunctionsOperations, resourceGroupName As String, jobName As String, functionName As String, Optional function As Function = Nothing) As ResourceTestStatus

static member BeginTest : Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.IFunctionsOperations * string * string * string * Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.Models.Function -> Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.Models.ResourceTestStatus

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
The name of the streaming job.
The name of the function.

If the function specified does not already exist, this parameter must contain the full function definition intended to be tested. If the function specified already exists, this parameter can be left null to test the existing function as is or if specified, the properties specified will overwrite the corresponding properties in the existing function (exactly like a PATCH operation) and the resulting function will be tested.
Docs.summary: Tests if the information provided for a function is valid. This can range from testing the connection to the underlying web service behind the function or making sure the function code provided is syntactically correct.

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.FunctionsOperationsExtensions.CreateOrReplace (operations, function, resourceGroupName, jobName, functionName, ifMatch, ifNoneMatch)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The definition of the function that will be used to create a new function or replace the existing one under the streaming job.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
The name of the streaming job.
The name of the function.
The ETag of the function. Omit this value to always overwrite the current function. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.
Set to '*' to allow a new function to be created, but to prevent updating an existing function. Other values will result in a 412 Pre-condition Failed response.
Docs.summary: Creates a function or replaces an already existing function under an existing streaming job.

static member Update : Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.IFunctionsOperations * Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.Models.Function * string * string * string * string -> Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.Models.Function

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.

A function object. The properties specified here will overwrite the corresponding properties in the existing function (ie. Those properties will be updated). Any properties that are set to null here will mean that the corresponding property in the existing function will remain the same and not change as a result of this PATCH operation.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
The name of the streaming job.
The name of the function.
The ETag of the function. Omit this value to always overwrite the current function. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.
Docs.summary: Updates an existing function under an existing streaming job. This can be used to partially update (ie. update one or two properties) a function without affecting the rest the job or function definition.
